https://rdm.abcd-j.de/instructions.html#: The dataset contains bulk sequencing data of FACS sorted B cells (naive B cells-NB; memory B cells - MB) and T cells (CD4+, CD8+) T cells  from peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) of 1 Multiple Sclerosis (MS) patients  treated with Ocrelizumab (Ocrevuz). For treated patient TP1: 6m before baseline; TP2: Baseline; TP3: cycle 1 + 3 months; TP4: cycle 1 + 6 months; TP5: cycle 2 + 5 months.
